tgt_original: ekakṣaṇāvabodho'  yaṃ jñeyo dānādinā muneḥ ||1 || iti

tadanu yadā bodhisattvasya pratipakṣabhāvanayā sarvavipakṣāpagamena sakalavyavadānapakṣavipākadharmatā'  vasthā sarvakalaṅkāpagamena śaradindujyotsnāvat śuklasvabhāvā jātā tadaikasminneva kṣaṇe vipākāvasthāprāptānāmanāsravasarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhājjñānaṃ prajñāpāramitetyevaṃ vipākadharmatā'  vasthā'  nāsravasarvadharmaikakṣaṇalakṣaṇo bhavatyekakṣaṇābhisambodho dvitīyaḥ |

yathaikāpi padikā puruṣapreritā sakṛdekavāraṃ sarvamaraghaṭṭaṃ sacchilpipūrvaparikarmasāmarthyāccalayati,  tathā pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhadharmadhātusāmarthyādekasminneva kṣaṇe jñānamekamanāsravamālambyamānaṃ kāryakāraṇasambandhabalātsarvaṃ sajātīyamabhimukhīkārayatīti
araghaṭṭaṃ yathaikāpi padikā puruṣeritā |  sakṛtsarvaṃ calayati jñānamekakṣaṇe tathā ||2 ||iti

narābhibhavanakuśalatayā siṃhavikrāntagāmitā || 11 ||  nāgābhibhavanakuśalatayā nāgavikrāntagāmitā || 12 ||  vaihāyasaṅgamakuśalatayā hasaṃvikrāntagāmitā || 13 ||  pramṛṣṭapāpadharmatayā mṛṣṭagātratā || 19 ||  vineyānurūpadharmadeśakatayā'
